availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry C. Russell (L'ville City Ct. Marshal )

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, City Court Deputy Marshall for the East District. Kentucky native. Married to Harriet Pilcher Russell. Father of Kate Russell, Eliza Russell, Columbus Russell, Lucretia Russell, and Alice Russell.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 2, p. 264. Henry Tanner, ed., Tanner’s Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1861 (Louisville: Directory Publication and Advertising Agency, 1861), 324. “Society,” Courier-Journal (Louisville, Ky.), March 24, 1889, p. 6.
